title: Why is poetry a good way to express? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because poetry shows rather than tells. Never say a thing is beautiful. Show the reader the thing is beautiful with description. A dream never tells you something is beautiful. It shows you beauty until you are so overawed with the beauty that you want to tell others about it. This is how poetry communicates ideas.

Writing poetry can allow them to safely express their emotions, both good and bad to prevent emotional buildup and relieve overwhelming stress. Seniors can benefit from writing poetry because it is a way to express their feelings about loneliness aging and past events..
